Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド村でトーマと戦った時に、 <Hilda>さんが発した光……あれって……
Entry.EnglishText: So the light that radiated from you when we fought Tohma... That was...

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……<Annie>が言った通り、 眠れる力ってヤツだったみたいね……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... It's like you said before. It seems as though it <Italic>was</Italic> some power that was lying dormant inside me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 角を折った状態であの力が出るという事は、 角以上の何かがありそうだな……
Entry.EnglishText: If you were capable of such a thing even with your horns broken, then it must be something beyond them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……心のあり方ひとつで、<Yellow>ヒト<White>は どこまでも強くなれるのかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I guess however strong a <Yellow>Human<White> being can become depends solely on their state of mind.
